channel.title: Asset-Management on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy
channel.description: Recent content in Asset-Management on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy

item.title: Artifract
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ first tokenized NFT platform backed by UBX and Unit 256 Ventures, which utilizes ‘Token Factory’ technology to fractionalize real-world assets like fine art and collectibles.

item.title: Vinne
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: App that makes it easy for anyone to earn a yield on DeFi holdings.

item.title: PropTech and the Future of Real Estate
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Real estate is one of the Philippines’ fastest-growing asset classes—but it remains illiquid, costly, and out of reach for most people. In this talk, I explore how PropTech, tokenization, and embedded finance can democratize property investing.

item.title: Manulife Asset Management & Trust
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The first trust entity in the Philippines owned by an insurance company, offering direct access to global asset classes through innovative feeder funds.
